title: Are the 2019 MacBooks Worth It?
description: The cheaper MacBook Air 2019 on Amazon:  Apple's new 2019 base MacBook Pro 13" on Amazon:  The higher end 4 port MacBook Pro 13" on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.
